text: MCF Workers' Union, a trade union at the Mangalore Chemicals and Fertilisers, in Karnataka, India. MCFWU is affiliated to Indian National Trade Union Congress. MCFWU is the dominant union at MCF. The president of MCFWU is N. M. Adyanthaya. Vice-presidents of MCFWU are P.V. Subraya and M. Nagesh. Category:Indian National Trade Union Congress Category:Trade unions at the Mangalore Chemicals and Fertilisers Category:Chemical industry trade unions
title: MCF Workers' Union
